sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; // import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // Link might be used in future card actions, keeping it for now // import Header from "./Header"; // <--- REMOVE THIS LINE function Dashboard() { const [activeTourists, setActiveTourists] = useState(1247); const [issuedIDs, setIssuedIDs] = useState(8934); const [currentIncidents, setCurrentIncidents] = useState(12); const [openSOS, setOpenSOS] = useState(3); // Simulate real-time updates useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setActiveTourists((prev) => prev + Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) - 1); setIssuedIDs((prev) => prev + Math.floor(Math.random() * 2)); setCurrentIncidents((prev) => Math.max(0, prev + Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) - 1) ); setOpenSOS((prev) => Math.max(0, prev + Math.floor(Math.random() * 2) - 1) ); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); return (
{/*
<--- REMOVE THIS COMPONENT */}
{/* This wrapper will now handle the margin for the sidebar */} {/* Statistics Cards */}

Active Tourists

{activeTourists.toLocaleString()}

+2.5% from yesterday

Issued IDs

{/* Green value */} {issuedIDs.toLocaleString()}

+12% from last week

Current Incidents

{/* Orange value */} {currentIncidents}

3 resolved today

Open SOS

{/* Red value */} {openSOS}

Requires immediate attention

{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Interactive Map */}

Live Tourist Tracking Map

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}
{/* Map Placeholder */}

Interactive Map

Live tourist locations, zones, and geo-fences

{/* Map Legend */}
Active Tourists
Safe Zones
Restricted Areas
Incident Locations
{/* Real-time Feed */}

Real-time Feed

New tourist registered

2 minutes ago

SOS alert resolved

5 minutes ago

Weather alert issued

12 minutes ago

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); } // --- Professional Government Website Styles --- const styles = { pageBackground: { fontFamily: "'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif", backgroundColor: '#e9eff6', // Light grayish-blue for a government feel minHeight: '100vh', color: '#2c3e50', lineHeight: '1.6', // No top padding here; the Sidebar takes full height, and content starts after it. }, // Removed all header-related styles as they are now handled by the Sidebar component // dashboardHeader, headerContent, headerLeft, logoContainer, logo, logoIcon, logoText, // navigation, navLink, navLinkActive, headerRight, userButton, userIcon, userButtonLogout // --- Main Content Wrapper --- mainContentWrapper: { maxWidth: 'calc(1400px - 250px)', // Adjust max width to account for sidebar margin: '0 auto', // Center the content horizontally *within its available space* padding: '30px 20px 20px 20px', marginLeft: '270px', // <--- IMPORTANT: This pushes content away from the fixed sidebar (Sidebar width + padding) // Adjust the `270px` if your sidebar is a different width or you want more/less space. // Assuming sidebar width is 250px + 20px gap for good measure. position: 'relative', // Needed if any children use absolute positioning relative to this wrapper zIndex: 1, // Ensure content is above any elements that might overlap, but below fixed sidebar if any }, // --- Statistics Cards --- statisticsContainer: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr))', gap: '20px', marginBottom: '30px', }, statCard: { backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '25px', boxShadow: '0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)', border: '1px solid #dcdcdc', transition: 'transform 0.2s ease-in-out', // '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-5px)' }, }, statContent: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', }, statLabel: { fontSize: '0.9em', color: '#6c757d', margin: '0 0 5px 0', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '0.5px', }, statValue: { fontSize: '2.2em', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#003366', // Default blue, can be overridden per card margin: '0', }, statChange: { fontSize: '0.85em', color: '#6c757d', // Default gray, can be overridden per card margin: '5px 0 0 0', }, statIconBlue: { backgroundColor: '#e0f2ff', // bg-blue-100 equivalent borderRadius: '50%', padding: '12px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#007bff', // text-blue-600 equivalent }, statIconGreen: { backgroundColor: '#e6ffed', // bg-green-100 equivalent borderRadius: '50%', padding: '12px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#28a745', // text-green-600 equivalent }, statIconOrange: { backgroundColor: '#fffbe6', // bg-orange-100 equivalent borderRadius: '50%', padding: '12px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#ffc107', // text-orange-600 equivalent }, statIconRed: { backgroundColor: '#ffebe6', // bg-red-100 equivalent borderRadius: '50%', padding: '12px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#dc3545', // text-red-600 equivalent }, icon: { width: '28px', height: '28px', }, // --- Main Content Grid for Map & Feed --- mainContentGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr))', // Default for smaller screens gap: '30px', // To achieve lg:grid-cols-3 and lg:col-span-2 for map, // you'd typically use media queries in a CSS file or a CSS-in-JS library. // For inline styles, this layout might become a flexbox or require manual width setting. // As a compromise, we'll use a single-column or two-column responsive grid here. '@media (min-width: 1024px)': { // Simulate lg:grid-cols-3, needs separate CSS for full effect gridTemplateColumns: '2fr 1fr', // Roughly 2/3 for map, 1/3 for feed+actions }, }, // --- Interactive Map Styles --- mapCard: { backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '12px', boxShadow: '0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)', border: '1px solid #dcdcdc', padding: '25px', }, mapHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: '20px', }, mapHeaderRight: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '10px', }, mapLastUpdated: { fontSize: '0.9em', color: '#6c757d', }, mapRefreshButton: { backgroundColor: 'transparent', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', padding: '5px', borderRadius: '5px', transition: 'background-color 0.2s ease', // '&:hover': { backgroundColor: '#e9eff6' }, }, mapRefreshIcon: { width: '18px', height: '18px', color: '#007bff', }, mapPlaceholder: { backgroundColor: '#f8f9fa', borderRadius: '8px', height: '384px', // h-96 display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', border: '1px dashed #ced4da', marginBottom: '20px', }, mapPlaceholderContent: { textAlign: 'center', }, mapPlaceholderIcon: { width: '64px', // w-16 height: '64px', // h-16 color: '#adb5bd', // gray-400 margin: '0 auto 16px auto', // mb-4 }, mapPlaceholderText: { color: '#495057', // gray-500 fontWeight: '500', margin: '0', }, mapPlaceholderSubText: { fontSize: '0.875em', color: '#6c757d', // gray-400 margin: '5px 0 0 0', }, mapLegend: { marginTop: '20px', display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: '20px', fontSize: '0.9em', color: '#495057', }, mapLegendItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '8px', // mr-2 equivalent }, mapLegendColor: { width: '12px', // w-3 height: '12px', // h-3 borderRadius: '50%', marginRight: '8px', }, // --- Real-time Feed Styles --- realtimeFeedContainer: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '24px', // space-y-6 }, realtimeFeedCard: { backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '12px', boxShadow: '0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)', border: '1px solid #dcdcdc', padding: '25px', }, realtimeFeedItems: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '16px', // space-y-4 }, realtimeFeedItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: '12px', // space-x-3 }, feedItemIconContainer: { padding: '8px', // p-2 borderRadius: '50%', // rounded-full display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, feedItemIcon: { width: '16px', // w-4 height: '16px', // h-4 }, feedItemText: { flexGrow: 1, }, feedItemTitle: { fontSize: '0.875em', // text-sm fontWeight: '500', // font-medium color: '#212529', // gray-900 margin: '0', }, feedItemTimestamp: { fontSize: '0.75em', // text-xs color: '#6c757d', // gray-500 margin: '2px 0 0 0', }, // --- Quick Actions Styles --- quickActionsCard: { backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '12px', boxShadow: '0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)', border: '1px solid #dcdcdc', padding: '25px', }, quickActionsGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(2, 1fr)', gap: '12px', // gap-3 }, quickActionButton: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', padding: '16px', // p-4 borderRadius: '8px', // rounded-lg transition: 'background-color 0.2s ease', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', // '&:hover': { backgroundColor: '#e9eff6' }, // Example: hover.bg-blue-100 }, quickActionButtonIcon: { width: '24px', // w-6 height: '24px', // h-6 marginBottom: '8px', // mb-2 }, quickActionButtonText: { fontSize: '0.875em', // text-sm fontWeight: '500', // font-medium margin: '0', }, // --- Reused from Incidents & Alerts for consistency --- cardTitle: { // Used for titles within cards fontSize: '1.5em', color: '#003366', // Adjusted to match deep blue marginBottom: '20px', borderBottom: '1px solid #eee', paddingBottom: '10px', }, }; export default Dashboard;
